darkhistory.electrons.positronium.weighted_photon_spec¶

darkhistory.electrons.positronium.weighted_photon_spec(eng)¶

Returns the weighted photon spectrum from positronium annihilation.

This assumes 3/4 ortho- and 1/4 para-, normalized to a single annihilation.

Parameters:eng (ndarray) – The energy abscissa.
Returns:The resulting photon spectrum.
Return type:Spectrum
